report.title: EBMS: Locations contained in a country.
report.description: Returns the list of locations that falls within a parent country.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN locations country ON country.location_type_id = #country_type_id# AND st_intersects(country.boundary_geom, coalesce(l.boundary_geom, l.centroid_geom)) #joins# WHERE l.deleted=false AND #website_filter# AND l.location_type_id = #location_type_id# #order_by#

param.name: country_location_id
param.description: The ID of the parent location to filter for
param.where: country.id=#country_location_id# AND country.id IS NOT NULL

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include
